nodes.text: The Nautilus was a cave located within the territory owned by the Scyre. Before the Scyre lived in the Nautilus, it was the ancestral home of a family that Phasma and her brother Keldo were a part of. The Nautilus contained a skylight, a throne, and was used to store many relics. The shelter it provided from the harsh conditions of Parnassos meant that it was also regarded highly among the Scyre.
